title: Designing a Mathematics Learning Process Applying Multimedia Design Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (equations, functions, geometry)
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, emphasizing mathematical problem-solving skills through project collaboration

learning_goals: Explain at least three strategies for integrating visual materials and text based on multimedia learning theory
Convert given mathematical concepts (function graphs, geometric shapes) into smartphone-friendly learning materials following multimedia design principles
Design and present a multimedia mathematics learning module applicable to real-world professional settings through team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
